Permidion Stark was a thief and burglar who operated on the Sword Coast in the second half of the 14 century DR.
Permidion carried a typical thiefs gear a set of leather armor, a short sword, a bow, a couple dozen arrows, and a singular gemstone.
In the , Permidion set his sights on the High Hedge northwest of Beregostâ€”the abode of the wizard Thalantyr. The thief salivated, thinking of all the precious magical trinkets just laying around the laboratory, but eventually decided against the heist. The big-time wizard had two powerful flesh golems guarding the place, invulnerable to non-magical damage, and the High Hedge had no shadows to hide in. Eventually, Permidion Stark set off to find a halfling village to harass, leaving High Hedge behind.
